snippet: Italy escaped Mexico, 6-5, in the opening game of Pool D in the World Baseball Classic in Scottsdale, Ariz.
abstract: Italy beats Mexico, 6-5, in opening game of Pool D in World Baseball Classic in Scottsdale, Ariz.
lead_paragraph: Italy escaped Mexico, 6-5, in the opening game of Pool D in the World Baseball Classic in Scottsdale, Ariz.
